website_summaries.verdict: Fun carnival-themed race bags will be a huge hit among kids and adults.
pros: Woven plastic material is durable, doesn’t tear easily
23.5 x 40 inch sized bags ideal for kids but suitable for adults as well
Will likely be able to reuse the bags 2-3 times
cons: Plastic can be slippery, hard to grip

customer_reviews.title: Better than others I've tried!!
customer_reviews.text: These were really cute! I purchased them for my K-2 Track and Field Day, in hopes that they would hold up better than the burlap ones I've ordered in the past. They did hold up better - only one of the six came apart at the bottom, but we had nearly 300 kids rotate through the station. The tops frayed significantly, but for the price, I thought they served their purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets for a 3rd grade class party. The bags were a great size for their age, but I can definitely see them working for average size adults as well. They are a bit powdery. They seem to be durable, did not have any rips after several uses.
customer_reviews.author: DTribeofFive

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my sons party this past weekend and they were absolutely amazing a total of about 25 kids including 3 adults used them and they held up perfectly fine for the price I wasn't expecting much but it honestly went over my expectations very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and great value for the price. Kids had fun, perfect size for kids. Adults, you can attempt to use the sacks as well, they are fun and you can fit in them... but, you're too old for that ****. I made it to the line...not back, figured out an awesome run in your sack technique to save myself from eternal embarrassment. Either way, totally fun!
customer_reviews.author: Smitthers

customer_reviews.title: Great product, durable and cleans well!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly durable! We had adults using these and no rips! It's definitely more "kid size" than adult, but for our family BBQ, the adults used these sacks and had fun. Some of the sacks got grassy/dirty, and we wiped them clean with damp paper towel - - - good as new!
customer_reviews.author: NY CT NH NC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Was awesome for my daughters 1st birthday. The kids had a blast, it held up for rounds of sack racing. Would definitely buy again and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi3108

customer_reviews.title: My kids favorite party game!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these and they have been a hit for every birthday party. I just gave 4 starts because after a few uses the top edges have begun to fray, so I’m not sure how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: T.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These held up surprisingly well during a recent birthday party. Despite the abuse they took, all of them are in tact and will be used at another party. The kids loved them and they don't make a huge mess like the burlap sacks do.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon C.

customer_reviews.title: the worked great and we had so much fun sack racing in ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong, durable for kids, the worked great and we had so much fun sack racing in the yard! Now, when grown men tried it, a couple of them frayed at the bottom but I doubt they were meant to hold 250 pound men. Stick with children and these will last you! We have used them at two parties so far with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Darland

customer_reviews.title: for kids!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our daughters 4th bday. It was a carnival theme. Kids ages 3-10 used them, and they worked great!! Everyone had a blast, and now I have them for any out back event going on to keep the kids busy and happy. They aren't as bright as pictured, they are faded out and "antique" looking. But none of us cared! They were for jumping in.
customer_reviews.author: Megg

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor activities
customer_reviews.text: The price is good that's why i bought it and kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rajan

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: Either child or adult can fit into these. It goes perfect with my kids carnival theme birthday
customer_reviews.author: taranika mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Being so inexpensive, I wasn't sure how well these would hold up. I was pleasantly surprised! These were used for a work party, so adults were using them. They were also used on a concrete floor. They came up to about our waist, and did not slip on the concrete floor. Overall, great price, and happy to know we can use them over again!
customer_reviews.author: kissarmyfanatic

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The bags are pretty good. The material is just like an inexpensive tarp. Some of the bags started tearing after only one use, but you have to remember they are cheap and plastic. Not bad for the price. Cute design and perfect for our carnival birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these bags 2 years ago and they are still in good shape
customer_reviews.author: C. McCallum

customer_reviews.title: But I hoped they would hoped up a little bit better. I do believe they will make it though ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore out faster than I hoped. I did have 56 kids sharing 6 bags ( rotational field day stations). But I hoped they would hoped up a little bit better. I do believe they will make it though another field day. And I will buy them again as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This was a major hit with the kids and the bags remained it great condition.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Held Up to Energetic 5-9 Year Olds
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use with elementary school age children. I was afraid the older children would tear the sacks but they did not. The sacks held together very well. I like the material. It is not scratchy like burlap bags would be.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Right on the Money
customer_reviews.text: These served their purpose. Not the most sturdy, well-made sacks, but better than I expected for the price. I wouldn't count on tons of use, but for a day/weekend of carnival games for small children, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bags
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality sturdy bags for playing sack race games.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: Party Hit!
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit at my 3yr olds birthday carnival! There sturdier than expected, and even big enough for the adults! And reusable!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, still usable after a carnival bday party with small and large children using them. Total Hit! Half the price as the party store
customer_reviews.author: Tattoomama13

customer_reviews.title: the guests enjoyed the game and the bags held up
customer_reviews.text: This was for an adult game night bday party and we had a blast, the guests enjoyed the game and the bags held up. People are already asking about the next game night and these will be in rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Chasisty

customer_reviews.title: Great price! The kids loved playing the toe sack ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price ! The kids loved playing the toe sack race game at our Church Fall Fest this year!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Potts

customer_reviews.title: Thick, durable
customer_reviews.text: Cute for sack races. Seem to be a pretty thick, durable bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Meets need. Not for multiple uses.
customer_reviews.text: Fine for what they are, but please don't expect more than a one-time use from them. We used for an HOA event and I don't think they're worth saving. Please recycle with your other plastics!
customer_reviews.author: DGMH

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchasd
customer_reviews.text: These bags were tough for playing. The adults even used them. Great for games outside. Didn't tear apart.
customer_reviews.author: sandra sutton

customer_reviews.title: These bags are perfect for my sons 8th birthday party and seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are perfect for my sons 8th birthday party and seem to be really well made. My son was walking/running/jumping/falling all around the house and the bag is still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: R. Venezia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The plastic seems to be super durable. I think they will serve the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Chelledean

customer_reviews.title: Good buy,good price
customer_reviews.text: Used this set for a birthday party...even adults played the sack race but no tears at all,very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: BAroc

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for kid's play
customer_reviews.text: We are going to use these for outdoor games with adults and children (age 3 and up) after Easter lunch. They feel sturdy and capable of kid wear. They are decorative and bright. I am glad I ordered these.
customer_reviews.author: josie from brevard,n.c.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a party
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for what I wanted- for a birthday party. They didn't hold up too well. Wouldn't be able to reuse them too many times.
customer_reviews.author: K.m.c.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: only give 3 start it would last no more than three birthday parties
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Hill

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not to strong but i guess it can be used several times.
customer_reviews.author: liliana lopez

customer_reviews.title: Probably only good for 1 more use
customer_reviews.text: It was ok. Probably only good for 1 more use. Used it twice already. It's more of a buy and toss. Like disposable plates. Use once and trash it. We were just lucky that we can use it multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! Made well & a very good length!
customer_reviews.author: BaBa

customer_reviews.title: A Load of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These were great fun at my kids' birthday party. They held up well with rough play for 10-11 year olds. When done, we just washed them out and put them up. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Shepp

customer_reviews.title: very durable sacks
customer_reviews.text: lasted thru the first party. I cleaned it and saving it for the next party. very durable.
customer_reviews.author: H Tran

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these bags for a back yard birthday party. ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these bags for a back yard birthday party. The bags were able to handle rough children and even adults. After the party, I folded the bags and stored them in the garage. Very durable (I've only used them for one party as of yet).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun for children and grown men
customer_reviews.text: Durable and fun for children and grown men. It was so much fun to watch our parent child relay race.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: ... third birthday party and the adults had as much fun as the kids
customer_reviews.text: It was purchased for my sons third birthday party and the adults had as much fun as the kids. It was a hit he had to hold severs rematch races. I would recommend buying two sets for a large party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: down-right foolishness. waste of money. Buy some cheap laundry bags and sew handles on them and you are good.
customer_reviews.author: Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Super cute popcorn/carnival sacks that were much larger and better ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute popcorn/carnival sacks that were much larger and better quality than I would have expected for that price point. We will be using these forever!
customer_reviews.author: JDK

customer_reviews.title: A whole lot of fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: A whole lot of fun for everyone! Stronger material than I expected and lasted through a rowdy picnic. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Nice and stron the as well as adults loved them
customer_reviews.author: carolyn Balknight

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and perfect for 5-10 year olds
customer_reviews.text: We used these for my child's birthday party and all the kids had a blast. They take a lot of abuse and fit most kids between 5-10 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Sisko

customer_reviews.title: They didn't rip - they're super cute - and perfect for our event
customer_reviews.text: I expected these to rip so I bought some additional burlap sacks just in case. They didn't rip - they're super cute - and perfect for our event!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Held the weight of both kids and adults. A lot of fun for everyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter birthday as a game they were all sturdy for the children and they had a blast racing in them.
customer_reviews.author: caligirlinthesouth

customer_reviews.title: These actually held up really well for a 7 year ...
customer_reviews.text: These actually held up really well for a 7 year old birthday party. You can't beat them for the price!
customer_reviews.author: H. Hibbs

customer_reviews.title: Tough sacks. Took a beating from kids and adults ...
customer_reviews.text: Tough sacks. Took a beating from kids and adults on multiple rounds of games. 2/6 sacks ended up with a few holes from our feet but we played alot with them
customer_reviews.author: #1Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Sacks
customer_reviews.text: Great for both adults and kids at our Easter party. Was surprised how durable they were. They were well used and are now packed away for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not reusable but gets the job done for a one time event
customer_reviews.author: Erica Day

customer_reviews.title: They were a great game for the kiddos
customer_reviews.text: We had these for my son's birthday party. They were a great game for the kiddos! All the adults were very entertained. One of the bags ripped with one of the bigger kids so we had to throw one away. All in all we had a good time with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids had fun playing games with them. After the day of use they're already fraying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game and sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: We had a great time kids love them held up good
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! Just what I expected. On time, very colorful, and good quality for the price. No surprises here!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Duncan-DePhillips

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Loved and will be able to use multiple times - very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya C

customer_reviews.title: These worked great for my four year old sons birthday party
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for my four year old sons birthday party. Very durable, I will be using these at future birthday parties
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: LOTS OF FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: LOTS OF FUN!!! Great product. It's perfect for kids and adults!! Sturdy enough for both. (ages from 3yrs-40yrs) I would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: It was great for my church event. Both kids and adults enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars plus -- only because the material is pretty thin feeling
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars plus -- only because the material is pretty thin feeling. I have a feeling they won't last the whole party, but we will see. They are cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Young

customer_reviews.title: My nieces and nephews enjoyed these. A great time was had by all
customer_reviews.text: My nieces and nephews enjoyed these. A great time was had by all. Not as large as I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids and Adults loved this .. Great Additions for our Picnic. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Bags held up well after about a half hour of constant races. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well made and clean up easy. Cuter in person than they are in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and clean up easy. Cuter in person than they are in the picture. The parents loved them and the kids had so much fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and good quality! I used these for a birthday party ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and good quality! I used these for a birthday party and adults used them for a good ole fashioned sack race....it was very comical indeed and brought back lots of childhood memories. After that I used them for growing potatoes in. They are holding up very nice against the weather and is breathable like the grow bags you pay 10 a pop for! I am super thrilled with the quality and price! I will be getting more next year!!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: kids loved them but they are near unusable
customer_reviews.text: Backyard carnival...kids loved them but they are near unusable. May get one more use of them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay but rip easily
customer_reviews.text: Some of these ripped pretty easily. They were good for a couple sack races.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Suppes

customer_reviews.title: Hit at the party!
customer_reviews.text: Kids (4-5 yrs) loved it! Bags are just the right size, nice material, and look fun. It was a hit at the party!
customer_reviews.author: Lennart Cattel

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy for sack race
customer_reviews.text: These aren't sturdy enough for a sack race. After one race, half of the bags were ripped to pieces. They are super-cute, though.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: very good product;
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for a family reunion. very good product;
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: These sacks are SUPER!!
customer_reviews.text: These sacks are SUPER!!! The really played a Huge part in the fun made at my grandsons Carnival Birthday Party. They ate very strong, even tbe Adults we're able to race. Awsome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I actually ordered these to store my surplus of potatoes ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered these to store my surplus of potatoes and onions for the winter months. These will work perfectly without having the musty smell from a traditional burlap bag.
customer_reviews.author: wiggles

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Kids and Adults used these. I saved them for the next party.
customer_reviews.author: HAPPY GARDEN

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: The kids had so much fun with these, the couldn't wait to do the potato sack race.
customer_reviews.author: Charlonda Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These sacks survived several small children & adults jumping! I would suggest to anyone. Cheap and fun for everyone! E.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Green

customer_reviews.title: These were awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a sack race for a bunch of silly adults and they lasted the whole time through! No rips or tears, and they weren't just the plain jane burlap sacks so they added just a little fun to the whole thing anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Paula B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We used these games to entertain the children at a family reunion every year
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: PINK!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my sons birthday.... THEY ARE PINK!!! The picture show them being red but they are definetly not red.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzo

customer_reviews.title: soso
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get to use it, but the material seems really thin.
customer_reviews.author: BEATRICE

product_meta.title: Fun Express Set of 6 - Woven Plastic Carnival Design Potato Sacks
product_meta.description: Size:2.5Set of 6 - Woven Plastic Carnival Design Potato Sacks
feature_bullets: These woven plastic sacks are perfect for school carnival day games!
